reviews.text: Travelled here between nov 25-dec 2nd on family vacay w/ wife & 4 year old daughter & for 1st time in Jamaica I was blown away at how great my stay was . I'll be as honest as I can.. First off , check in: Was very easy & quick ! We were booked in a resort view room and My wife simply asked if there was any rooms availible with a view of the ocean & were put into a room with 1 of the best sightlines I have ever been in , 607. Overlooked not only the ocean, but the golf course & mountains as well!! The room : Was very clean looking , updated style , beds pretty comfy , lots of pillows very comfortable feel . Bathroom was good , shower had good water pressure, only downside was the drainage and the handles in the sink were slightly leaky(not a big deal to me , but I know ppl like to hear this so).
reviews.title: Best Vacation ever!!

reviews.text: Resort atmosphere: felt like I was on vacation!! The grounds were very neat .The common areas inside the hotel (lobby/ outside patios) were kept clean , spacious and very new looking. There were vendors outside selling goods but unlike other places I have been (Dominican) there was no pressure at all from them to get you to buy ! The fact that you could take a walk not only around the resort , but across the golf course as well was pretty neat !
reviews.title: Food and Beach Average at Best

reviews.text: Food/Drink: Being a picky eater I was expecting to lose weight due to thinking I would have less to choose from ..Wrong! We ate at the bufett every morning and there was tons to choose from. From the omlette stn. to the bacon/eggs etc. tons to choose from .French toast,waffles,pancakes as well as local fruits and traditional dishes.The fact you can eat breakfast & see the ocean as well is clutch!
reviews.title: Convenient but not optimal for 3 yr olds

reviews.text: Lunch was mostly spent at the Oceanside grill and again great selection ! jerk pork and chicken was pretty much the go to meals .They have a kids menu too which was great .
reviews.title: Excellent Day Trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Dinners were again at the buffet and they had different themed meals each night . Pretty good eating too! We did eat 1 night at the 3 Palms and this was an awesome time! You do have to book but you actually take a shuttle to it and eat overlooking the golf course. Wonderful meal and gave that feel like we were off the resort but we werent!
reviews.title: A certain type of resort

reviews.text: Excellent resort! I joined my sister there for a trip in November, 2012. The grounds are beautiful and well-kept. Beautiful pool areas. The entire resort has a very spacious feel. I highly recommend Hilton Rose Hall. Great staff, wonderful food, and perfect relaxation.
reviews.title: Paradise in Montego Bay

reviews.text: I had an amazing time. Food there is excellent.. I especially loved the staff... the highlight of my time was the friendly genuine and warm staff they have.. it's a small hotel but still amazing. I will be going there again. Only thing I would say is it would be nice to have more entertainment throughout the day...
reviews.title: Wonderful staff

reviews.text: My family and I stayed here 11/16- 11/21/2012... We pick a diffferent island every year.. This resort by far is the best!! The staff were great! The kids were constantly entertained especially the Waterpark:))) We will definitely be back here next year!!! Words can't describe this place! Just GO!!!!
reviews.title: BEST PLACE EVER!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I were here from 11/17-11/24. First off, if you're looking for a super-luxurious top of the line resort, you won't be happy with this one, and you will need to pay more than what this one costs. However, if you're looking for a good deal, all-inclusive, easy-going vacation, I don't see how you can be unhappy at the Hilton Rose Hall (unless of course you are robbed in the night!). Here's what I thought about each major portion of the resort.
reviews.title: Very Satisfying Vacation

reviews.text: Room - We booked an ocean view room and were pleasantly surprised when we got upgraded to an "oceanfront" suite. We had two balconies which faced the ocean/pool and had amazing views to wake up to every morning. Room furnishings were very comfy, but nothing to rave about. Room was very clean and mostly updated, but the age of the resort shows in some of the details. Shower had mediocre water pressure, but it was adequate. Overall, a very nice room.
reviews.title: Excellent service - they made my holiday great

reviews.text: My family came for a wedding which was absolutely beautiful, but I was underwhelmed with the Hilton Rose Hall. check in wax slow and disorganized. The room and the grounds are beautiful. The beach was small and had lots of seaweed. My biggest issue was with staff. I found them disinterested and not very helpful. The most bothersome event was with a housekeeping staff person who told me that I forfeited getting my room cleaned because I had been in it too long. I told that was interesting because I was at the pool frm 9:00 to 2:30but my kids were napping and my husband was in the shower she handed me some towels and went on her way. The food is okay not great but not bad. I did not go to any of the reservation restaurant just did the buffet.
reviews.title: Just Okay... Would not pick on my own

reviews.text: Jamaica - Nvember 2012.
reviews.title: An excellent all inclusive resort
Just ok....
reviews.text: What a fantastic resort. Rooms excellent, buffet food fantastic, staff friendly, very attentive and go out of their way to make you feel welcome. I spent 10 days on site and overall found little if anything that was at fault. They have a couple of fine dining restarants on site but unless you feel the need to dress up in evening wear the buffet food is very, very good, plenty of it and of significnt variety. One tiny minor thing - All the east facing rooms need black out curtains as when the sun comes up at 6.30am....well.

Common areas were beautiful. Rooms were very outdated. The beach was full of sea grass that didn't get cleaned as much as it should have. Staff wasn't overly friendly. Water sports guys were great. Always plenty of chairs.
reviews.title: Great place for family or couple

reviews.text: We had a great time; a beautiful room, excellent friendly staff, delicious food and a great golf course. It is the perfect combination between relaxing and sensation if you want too. A great Miami style relaxing pool and if you want a waterpark, but they do not mix so you have the perfect experience. Been there 3 times now and many more to follow!
reviews.title: SO AMAZED!!!

reviews.text: We stayed at the Hilton Rose Hill in Jamaica from 11/21/12-11/25/12. We had a group of 13. Our sons room was robbed while they we were sleeping our second night there. The event was very scary because the kids were sleeping in the room when the burglar was there. The room was on the 5th floor so they had left the balcony door open. The main door had been locked and was dead bolted. The door between the rooms was also locked and dead bolted. The burglar came in the middle of the night and took several electronic items they had in the room.
reviews.title: Someone broke into our room while sleeping in it.

reviews.text: The hotel staff was slow to respond. The police did not come until later that day and we had to wait around all day to find out if they were coming or not. We then had to wait around all day for them the next day to do an official report. Some of the hotel security staff tried to be helpful but others were rude and not helpful at all. The hotel did offer any extra assistance for the kids. They were offered a free massage and then had to miss the appointment because that is when the police showed up 2 days later to make a formal report of the incident. We spent 2 days waiting around the lobbey and not able to enjoy our vacation because we were made to stay around the lobby and wait for the local police or the hotel security. Meantime the rest of our group was also on hold because everyone was waiting for us to be free to do the activities we had planned for the group.
reviews.title: What can only be described as the Most amazing holiday....

reviews.text: Meantime the quality of the hotel was not great. The public bathroom areas were either not working or the bathrooms had broken faucets and were very old and worn looking. The pool area had several area where the pool edging cement was broken and sharp edged. The beach was covered in litter that washed up each day.
reviews.title: Great service, good value & wished we could stay!!!!

reviews.text: The food was okay. Nothing special. The beds were very comfortable.
reviews.title: 3.75 Stars. Good for Families. Good Pool, OK Food, Mediocre Beach.

reviews.text: I have just returned from a 2 week holiday staying here and it was quite simply the most amazing holiday!
reviews.title: Going downhill
